nodes.text: The Leresen system was a star system that was located within the Lannik Wilds, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It was home to the sentient Leresai species.
The Leresen system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square R-13.
